name: Old Sports Car Puzzle
description:
In United States is very are proud of its old sports cars! Collect all the pieces of this online puzzle to get the whole picture. This flash game made for Friv games site. Have fun!

You can choose any level of complexity for the more fun. Set the required number of parts of the picture and press "Start" button. To get a hint, use the button "Hint" at the bottom of the game screen. To assemble a picture automatically, click "Solve" button.

Controls:

Use your mouse to move the pieces of the image.
